title: Chapter IV - Minimum Standards And Regulations For Management Of Secure Facilities Operated By The Office Of Children And Family Service
content:
Chapter IV - Minimum Standards And Regulations For Management Of Secure Facilities Operated By The Office Of Children And Family Service

State Regulations

Part 7401 - Preamble And Legal Authority (§ 7401.1 to 7401.2)

Part 7402 - Classification (§ 7402.1 to 7402.8)

Part 7403 - Admissions (§ 7403.1 to 7403.10)

Part 7404 - Security And Supervision (§ 7404.1 to 7404.16)

Part 7405 - Discipline (§ 7405.1 to 7405.9)

Part 7406 - Reportable Incidents (§ 7406.1 to 7406.6)

Part 7407 - Printed Material And Publications (§ 7407.1 to 7407.4)

Part 7410 - Health Services (§ 7410.1 to 7410.29)

Part 7414 - Mental Health Services (§ 7414.1 to 7414.8)

Part 7415 - Case Management And Counseling (§ 7415.1 to 7415.10)

Part 7416 - Educational Services For Residents (§ 7416.1)

Part 7417 - Food Services (§ 7417.1 to 7417.9)

Part 7418 - Exercise, Recreation And Leisure Activities (§ 7418.1 to 7418.5)

Part 7419 - Resident Personal Hygiene (§ 7419.1 to 7419.10)

Part 7420 - Grievance Program (§ 7420.1 to 7420.9)

Part 7421 - Access To Legal Services (§ 7421.1 to 7421.5)

Part 7422 - Visitation (§ 7422.1 to 7422.8)

Part 7423 - Correspondence And Telephone (§ 7423.1 to 7423.7)

Part 7424 - Nondiscriminatory Treatment (§ 7424.1 to 7424.2)

Part 7425 - Religion (§ 7425.1 to 7425.10)

Part 7426 - Commissary (§ 7426.1)

Part 7427 - Access To Media (§ 7427.1 to 7427.4)

Part 7428 - Library Services (§ 7428.1 to 7428.6)

Part 7433 - Personnel Standards (§ 7433.1 to 7433.7)

Part 7434 - Policy (§ 7434.1 to 7434.4)

Part 7435 - Deathbed And Funeral Visits (§ 7435.1 to 7435.10)

Part 7438 - Construction And Renovation (§ 7438.1 to 7438.2)

Part 7439 - Sanitation (§ 7439.1 to 7439.8)

Part 7440 - Fire Prevention And Safety (§ 7440.1 to 7440.4)

Part 7441 - Environmental Health And Safety (§ 7441.1 to 7441.9)

Part 7442 - Maximum Facility Capacity (§ 7442.1 to 7442.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
